abstract: Charley Hoffman leads first round at Texas Open with five-under-par 67; other golf news noted.
lead_paragraph: Hoffman took advantage of calmer afternoon conditions to take the first-round lead in the windswept Texas Open, shooting a five-under-par 67.
snippet: Hoffman took advantage of calmer afternoon conditions to take the first-round lead in the windswept Texas Open, shooting a five-under-par 67.
